name: Gauss (HuskiGames, Paige Maylott, USO Games)
description:
Gauss: (noun) "a unit of magnetic induction, equal to one ten-thousandth of a tesla."

Gauss is a living magnet, having awaken upon a junk pile from a stray lightning strike. On a world made of metal, everything is your enemy.

Gameplay: Wheel back and forth to dodge, or use the awesome force of magnetism to throw your enemies away before they crash into you. How long can you last before you ... degauss?

Programmer and Artist: Huski
Programmer: Shemtom
Narrative Design and Game Writer: Paige Maylott

An entry for ScoreSpace Jam 18 (2022)  April 29th 2022 at 3:00 PM to May 2nd 2022.
